Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44716 affecting package node-problem-detector for versions less than 0.8.10-20
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-44716 affecting package node-problem-detector for versions less than 0.8.10-20. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package node-problem-detector is earlier than 0.8.10-20, affected by CVE-2021-44716
